Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3707 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.107.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3707 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.107.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 5.15.107.1-2, affected by CVE-2022-3707
